p: Artemisinin (Sigma Aldrichâ€”France) and isolated compounds were prepared in DMSO. All stocks were then diluted with culture medium to achieve the required concentrations. The final solution of all plant extracts, isolated compounds and artemisinin contained 0.4% DMSO, which was found to be non-toxic to the parasites. Drugs and test compounds were then placed in 96-well flat bottom tissue culture grade plates.
